data.name: ReboTurn
data.description: ReboTurn website is Modern and professional website for my Startup company. It is a responsive and SEO-friendly website that is perfect for showcasing my business and services. This website is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, React.js, Next.js and Three.js and is fully responsive.

data.name: Go-Bittorrent
data.description: Go-Bittorrent is a simple BitTorrent client implemented in Go. It allows you to download torrent files from the BitTorrent network.

data.name: Spotify Clone
data.description: A clone of the Spotify web player, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project is a great way to practice your front-end skills and learn how to build a music player from scratch.

data.name: Weather API
data.description: A simple RESTful API for accessing weather data. This project is built with PHP and Laravel, and it provides real-time weather information for any location in the world.

data.name: Gold Rates Today
data.description: Get the latest and most accurate gold prices with our state-of-the-art project, built using the fastest technologies available. Our gold rates are displayed in a wide range of currencies and we also provide silver prices and rates for popular cryptocurrencies. Stay on top of the market with our comprehensive and reliable data.

data.name: Tic Tac Toe Game (AI and Multiplayer game)
data.description: Experience the classic game of tic tac toe like never before with our exciting app, featuring three levels of difficulty and online multiplayer functionality. Built natively for iOS using the recommended technologies of Swift and SwiftUI, this app is sure to provide hours of entertainment. Try it out today and see why it's quickly becoming a fan favorite!

data.name: Go URL Shortener
data.description: This is a simple URL shortener service built with Go and Redis.The service provides an API to shorten long URLs. It uses Redis as a storage to save the mapping between the original URL and the generated short URL.

data.name: the life path number Android and Ios App
data.description: Get the best astrology app for Android and iOS with the Life Path Number app. Trustworthy and amazing for all astrology types.

data.name: Go TCP Realtime Chat
data.description: This is a simple chat server implemented in Go. It allows multiple clients to connect, join rooms, and send messages to each other.
